Box.Shared.Description:
Beware of critters inside.
Use this trinket to open an inventory ({{Capacity}} slots), trinkets placed inside will be equipped.
Opossum.Description: Marlon introduced me to a skilled and resourceful opossum, she's working hard for her 36 children.
Opossum.Chatter.0: You can open my pack with the "Open Tinker Inventory" key (default RightAlt Plus OemPeriod or LeftStick+ControllerX), set this via TrinketTinker's GMCM.#$b#If you forgot to take your things before I leave, don't fret! They will be safely delivered to the lost and found.
config.EarlyTrinketSlot.name: Early Trinket Slot
config.EarlyTrinketSlot.description: Enable trinket slot early, which also make trinkets drop from monsters early. This option takes 1 save/load to change.
